author: National Bureau
text:
Suresh Prabhu plans tourist trains to connect the region

Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu said on Thursday that the government’s vision was to connect Asia through the Indian Railway network.

“There is a vision and, we are working on it on how we can connect the whole continent [Asia] through railway. China has connected the Old Silk Road to other parts of Asia,” he said.

Mr. Prabhu talked about the possibility of running tourist trains to connect other parts of Asia. “Possibly, we can run some tourist trains to bring together the entire region as a hub … Freight movement can also happen in a seamless manner,” the Minister said.
title: ‘Aim is to link Asia through Indian Railways’
